result.markdown:
---
title: "Installing dcifer"
output: html_document
---




The `dcifer` R package is both on CRAN and part of the [plasmogenepi.r-universe](https://plasmogenepi.r-universe.dev/dcifer). 

You can install it by running the following code: 

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
# Install dcifer in R:
install.packages('dcifer', repos = c('https://plasmogenepi.r-universe.dev', 'https://cloud.r-project.org'))
```
:::
